coursework: Rapid Prototype Development and Creative Programming

experience.title: IT Intern
bullets: Cultivated proficiency in Ruby, SQL, HTML, and other technologies through hands-on development.
Built 15+ projects and scripts including report generators, data analysis tools, and automation for sales and operations.
Performed daily IT operations monitoring firewalls, servers, and cloud systems.

experience.title: English Tutor
bullets: Provided one-on-one English tutoring to non-native speakers from South Korea.
Focused on improving conversation skills, grammar, and professional communication.
Helped students prepare for jobs and school opportunities in the US.

experience.title: Summer Camp Counselor
bullets: Led ceramic workshops teaching shaping, glazing, and painting techniques.
Supervised 30 children aged 5–12 to ensure a safe and inclusive environment.
Collaborated with coworkers to coordinate schedules and manage group dynamics.
Selected as one of six senior directors on the governing Board of Directors.
Managed a $10,000 stock portfolio, achieving a 10% annual return through market analysis.
Collaborated with other board members to make strategic investment decisions.
Coordinated a club of 40+ members to organize cheers and themed events at 20+ home games.
Created posters, pep rallies, and social media content to increase engagement.
Boosted student attendance at games by 20% through targeted outreach and content.
Led varsity baseball team to two league championships and two CIF playoff appearances.
Fostered teamwork, discipline, and resilience through consistent practice and strategy.
Bridged communication between coaches and teammates to ensure alignment and resolve conflicts.

projects.name: Internal AI Agent App
bullets: Developed a full-stack AI Agent web app integrating DigitalOcean’s GradientAI platform with knowledgebases and function routes.
Built a chat interface with Markdown streaming, typing animations, and Google Speech-to-Text support.
Implemented PostgreSQL persistence for chat history to provide users with past conversation logs.

projects.name: Event Lead Capture Web App
bullets: Designed and deployed a lead capture app to streamline data collection at trade shows.
Integrated APIs for email validation, address verification, and AI-generated company descriptions.
Automated entry of captured leads into the company’s CRM (Clypboard).

projects.name: Workday to Google Calendar Converter
bullets: Built a tool allowing students to upload Workday schedules in XLSX format and convert them into recurring Google Calendar events.
Implemented Google OAuth authentication for secure access and deployment.
Published the app publicly on Vercel with full functionality and verification.
